title: is League of Legends really free to play? are we being mind controlled?
body:
"League of Legends has made almost $1 billion in microtransactions", and so I would like to apologize, Riot is not greedy, we are stupid.

free to play game ha?

http://www.zam.com/Im/Image/234445.jpg

teasing people with smart psychology should be illegal, it's not, so I guess people will keep buying stupid crap they will use once or twice and then never use again, at least in gaming it's kinda forver.

on the other hand, offering a person who lives in fallout 3 clean water and asking him to pay for it.. is that really a choice he can make?, what does that tell us about gaming companies?.

do we as humans really have free will?, or are we are just another stupid dog wanting a big sausage and is willing to do anything for it. I find free will over rated, because we want to believe it is stronger than the free will we actully possess .
